chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'

Premises:
term = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
handleAppendEntries_currentTerm : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleAppendEntries_currentTerm_leaderId : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st < currentTerm st' \/ currentTerm st <= currentTerm st' /\ (leaderId st' = leaderId st \/ leaderId st' <> None)
handleAppendEntries_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleAppendEntries_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_term_votedFor : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg) (h' : name), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> votedFor st' = Some h' -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries_term' : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (h' : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (te : term) (e : entry) (d : raft_data) (m : msg), In (te, e) (allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci)) -> handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t h' pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> In (te, e) (allEntries (fst st)) \/ In e es /\ te = currentTerm d
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
update_elections_data_appendEntries_log_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (h' : name) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log (snd st) /\ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = allEntries (fst st) \/ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = map (fun e : entry => (t, e)) es ++ allEntries (fst st) /\ (currentTerm st' = t /\ log st'...
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
handleAppendEntries_log_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st /\ log st' = log st \/ leaderId st' <> None /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ commitIndex st' = Init.Nat.max (commitIndex st) (Init.Nat.min ci (maxIndex es)) /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ t >= currentTerm st /\ log st' = es /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (...
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
handleRequestVote_currentTerm : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleAppendEntriesReply_currentTerm : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'

handleRequestVote_currentTerm_monotonic : forall (pDst : name) (t : nat) (cid : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (d' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote pDst d t cid lli llt = (d', m) -> currentTerm d <= currentTerm d'
advanceCurrentTerm_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), currentTerm st <= t -> currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = t
update_elections_data_appendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => let (_, m) := handleAppendEntries me (snd st) t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit in match m with | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 true => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := map (fun e : entry => (t0, e)) entries0 ++ allEntries (fst st) |} | AppendEntriesReply t0...
advanceCurrentTerm_currentTerm : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), currentTerm st <= currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)
haveNewEntries_not_empty : forall (st : raft_data) (es : list entry), haveNewEntries st es = true -> es <> []
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> terms_and_indices_from_one entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
prevLog_leader_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> currentTerm (nwState net leader) = prevLogTerm -> 0 < prevLogIndex -> 0 < prevLogTerm ->...-> Prop Arguments prevLog_leader_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
haveNewEntries_true : forall (st : raft_data) (es : list entry), haveNewEntries st es = true -> es <> [] /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> maxTerm es))
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
